bigshot
Class CylindricalToCubic

java.lang.Object
  bigshot.AbstractCubicTransform<Derived>
      bigshot.AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<CylindricalToCubic>
          bigshot.CylindricalToCubic

public class CylindricalToCubic
extends AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<CylindricalToCubic>

Transforms an cylindrical image map to rectilinear images. Used to create a cube map for bigshot.VRPanorama.

Method Detail

fromHuginPtoParameters

public CylindricalToCubic fromHuginPtoParameters(int w,
                                                 int h,
                                                 double v,
                                                 int cropLeft,
                                                 int cropRight,
                                                 int cropTop,
                                                 int cropBottom)
Description copied from class: AbstractCubicTransform
Sets the required projection parameters from the Hugin .pto parameters. The Hugin pto describes an image that is w pixels wide and h pixels tall. It has a horizontal field of view of v degrees. From that image, a sub-rectangle with top-left coordinates (cropLeft, cropTop) and bottom-right coordinates (cropRight, cropBottom) has been rendered and is the actual input image to the projection.

Specified by:
fromHuginPtoParameters in class AbstractCubicTransform<CylindricalToCubic>
Parameters:
w - the width of the map image, in pixels
h - the height of the map image, in pixels
v - the horizontal field of view, in degrees
cropLeft - the first used column of the image
cropRight - one past the rightmost used column of the image
cropTop - the first used row in the image
cropBottom - one past the bottom-most used row of the image

transformPoint

protected void transformPoint(double theta,
                              double phi,
                              Point2D output)
Description copied from class: AbstractSphericalCubicTransform
Transforms a ray in 3d-space, given by theta and phi to image map coordinates.

Specified by:
transformPoint in class AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<CylindricalToCubic>
Parameters:
theta - the yaw angle of the ray, in radians. Increases clockwise.
phi - the pitch angle of the ray, in radians. Increases downwards.
output - the result of the transformation. Gives the image map coordinates in pixels

transformToFace

public static Image transformToFace(Image in,
                                    int outputSize,
                                    double vfov,
                                    double oy,
                                    double op,
                                    double or,
                                    double yaw,
                                    double pitch,
                                    double roll)
                             throws Exception
Transforms a cylindrical map to a rectilinear image.

Parameters:
in - the equirectangular image map
outputSize - the size (width and height), in pixels, of each face
vfov - the vertical field of view, in degrees
oy - the initial yaw offset, in degrees
op - the initial pitch offset, in degrees
or - the initial roll offset, in degrees
yaw - the yaw angle of the viewer, in degrees
pitch - the pitch angle of the viewer, in degrees
roll - the roll angle of the viewer, in degrees
Throws:
Exception

Transforms an cylindrical map to a rectilinear image.

Parameters:
imageName - the equirectangular image map
output - the output file name
outputSize - the size (width and height), in pixels, of each face
vfov - the vertical field of view, in degrees
oy - the initial yaw offset, in degrees
op - the initial pitch offset, in degrees
or - the initial roll offset, in degrees
yaw - the yaw angle of the viewer, in degrees
pitch - the pitch angle of the viewer, in degrees
roll - the roll angle of the viewer, in degrees
